synopsis.text: Asagedani, a young adolescent, finds himself in possession of a peculiar device created by the eccentric Dr. Toyama, allowing him to inhabit the body of his crush, the stunning Komaba. With this newfound ability, he explores the physical sensations and experiences of being a girl, while also indulging in intimate moments with Komaba's friend, Nakano. However, his reckless actions lead to a series of unexpected sexual encounters with both genders, all while navigating the complexities of living in a girl's body. As Asagedani's secret escapades unfold, he must face the consequences of his actions when Komaba's brother and his muscular friends enter the scene.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
